swissmuni 0.4.3
  • Reference

Get municipality mutations

Source: R/swissmuni.gen.R
mutations.Rd

Returns a tibble with mutation data of Swiss municipalities. The data describes all changes related to the municipalities made between start_date and end_date.

Usage

mutations(
  start_date = NULL,
  end_date = NULL,
  incl_territory_exchange = FALSE,
  use_cache = TRUE,
  cache_lifespan = "1 day"
)

Arguments

start_date

The begin of the period the data covers. A date or a character scalar in the format "YYYY-MM-DD".

end_date

The end of the period the data covers. A date or a character scalar in the format "YYYY-MM-DD".

incl_territory_exchange

Include information (additional rows) about territory exchanges within and between municipalities.

use_cache

Return cached results if possible. If FALSE, results are always newly fetched regardless of cache_lifespan.

cache_lifespan

The duration after which cached results are refreshed (i.e. newly fetched). A valid lubridate duration. Only relevant if use_cache = TRUE. Defaults to 1 day (24 hours).

Value

A tibble.

Examples

swissmuni::mutations(start_date = "2020-01-01",
                     end_date = "2020-06-30",
                     incl_territory_exchange = TRUE)
#> # A tibble: 18 × 14
